Description:
Detects threat actors proxy executing code and bypassing application controls by leveraging wmic and the `/FORMAT` argument switch to download and execute an XSL file (i.e js, vbs, etc).

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: WMIC Loading Scripting Libraries
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\wmic.exe' and (image_loaded like '%\jscript.dll' or image_loaded like '%\vbscript.dll')
